title: The best NAS devices of 2023
description: These best network-attached storage machines feature user-friendly interfaces, fast performance, and excellent app availability.

title: Netflix is now charging for password-sharing in the U.S.
description: The decision comes after the company tested out password-sharing fees in Canada and three other countries worldwide.

title: How to use the Claude AI chatbot in Slack
description: Claude integrates into Slack so you and other people in your workspace can use its AI smarts to get help with work-related requests, processes, and projects.

title: Roll over, Roomba? Dyson's revamped robot vacuum boasts 'six times' the suction
description: The Dyson 360 Vis Nav packs a fisheye lens, a triple-action brush bar -- and a hefty price tag.

title: Final Cut Pro on the iPad: A surprisingly touching experience
description: These long-awaited iPad versions of Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro mean much more than just putting Pro apps on Apple tablets.

title: Apple confirms WWDC opening keynote will take place June 5
description: The keynote usually gives us a glimpse at major software updates and, occasionally, some hardware. And this year that likely means we'll see Apple's rumored AR/VR headset.

title: How to use Bitwarden Send (and when you should)
description: If you have a document or text that contains secret or sensitive information you'd like to keep away from prying eyes but you still need to share it with someone, try Bitwarden Send.

title: Microsoft embraces OpenAI's ChatGPT plugin standard
description: These updates will give developers the ability to create their own plugins and integrate them seamlessly across the Microsoft Copilot stack.

title: Microsoft announces Azure tools to help developers deploy complex environments and secure their apps
description: At Build 2023, Microsoft revealed how its new Azure tools can save developers time and stress.

title: Microsoft unveils Fabric analytics program, OneLake data lake to span cloud providers
description: Fabric is both a nod to customers trying to tighten their belts and also to the multi-cloud database tools such as Snowflake and Data Bricks that threaten Microsoft's established database franchise.

title: All the major Bing Chat and AI announcements from Microsoft Build 2023
description: Microsoft is continuing to grow its presence in the AI space with a series of new updates and launches. Here's everything you need to know.

title: Your next phone will be able to run generative AI tools (even in Airplane Mode)
description: At Build 2023, Qualcomm is partnering with Microsoft to expand its on-device AI capabilities. Here's how.

title: Microsoft Edge gets AI-powered upgrades and these other new features
description: Microsoft's web browser, Edge, has received AI-powered upgrades, a redesign, and a better experience on mobile devices. Here's a look at what's new on Microsoft Edge.

title: Microsoft just supercharged ChatGPT with Bing's AI-powered search
description: OpenAI and Microsoft team up to bring you the best of both AI chatbots in one. Here's what this means.

title: Microsoft makes a push for AI responsibility and safety through Azure
description: Azure AI Content Safety is now available in preview, but extra features are also coming for Designer and Bing.

title: Microsoft adding more AI smarts to Windows 11 via Copilot and Dev Home
description: Built into Windows 11, Windows Copilot will use AI to handle your questions and requests, while Dev Home will help developers better manage their projects. Microsoft teases a variety of Windows enhancements at its Build 2023 conference.

title: The Microsoft Store will help curate AI tools for you now
description: You probably don't realize how many tasks AI can help you with now, but Microsoft's new AI hub aims to change that.

title: Bolstered Dev Box leads developer delights at Microsoft Build 2023
description: Microsoft is previewing new, powerful configurations for its virtual developer workstation Dev Box, and AI Copilot features for its low-code Power Platform.

title: These generative AI tools coming to Adobe Photoshop will blow your mind
description: From changing the scenery of images to adding new subjects via text, here's what you need to know about Adobe's new AI image generator tool and when it will be available.

title: Dead gadget battery? This $6 tool is a must-have for tech repairs
description: You can't always trust "new" parts to work properly. So if you're able to test the components you're fitting before installation, do it!

title: Amazon continues to improve Kindle Scribe. Here's what's in the latest update
description: A new selection tool and books you can write on are just two of the latest additions to Amazon's combination e-reader and digital notebook.

title: Amazon's new $329 Fire Max 11 productivity bundle looks surprisingly promising
description: Amazon seems to have learned some lessons from its last attempt at a tablet designed for work. Here's what to know.

title: Singapore wants to plug AI skills gap in finance sector
description: A new initiative aims to consolidate demand for artificial intelligence and data analytics roles and develop the required skillsets for financial institutions.

title: Samsung Display unveils display that rolls up like a scroll
description: Rollable Flex can extend by five times in length using an O-shaped axis like a scroll.
